TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件可讓您控制代碼控制項 （例如，藉由外部資料來源） 之外的程式碼擲回的例外狀況。Handling the event lets you handle exceptions thrown by code outside your control (for example, by an external data source). 使用屬性來判斷狀態的在例外狀況的時間。Use the property to determine the state of the at the time of the exception. 使用屬性，以擷取例外狀況資料。Use the property to retrieve the exception data. 如果您想要處理的例外狀況，由其他事件處理常式，設定屬性`true`。If you want to handle the exception by additional event handlers, set the property to `true`. 和屬性通常會指出發生資料錯誤的資料格。The and properties normally indicate the cell in which the data error occurred. 發生錯誤時在外部資料來源，不過，資料來源可能不會提供發生錯誤的資料行。When the error occurs in an external data source, however, the data source may not provide the column in which the error occurred. 在此情況下，屬性通常表示在發生錯誤時的目前儲存格的資料行。In this case, the property typically indicates the column of the current cell at the time of the error. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何回應所提供的資訊類別。The following code example demonstrates how to respond to information provided by the class. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#50)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#50)]

summary.span: 取得發生錯誤時， 之狀態的詳細資料。

span.span: Gets details about the state of the when the error occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成員列舉型別可能會使用位元結合`OR`運算子來呈現的資料繫結狀態資料錯誤發生時。Members of the enumeration may be combined using the bitwise `OR` operator to represent the state of a data-bound when a data error occurred. 例如，如果使用者輸入無效的資料格的值 （例如，輸入中需要日期的儲存格的名稱），然後選取不同的資料格，會嘗試將無效的資料格的值認可。For example, if a user enters an invalid cell value (such as entering a name in a cell that requires a date) and then selects a different cell, the will try to commit the invalid cell value. 當認可失敗時，將會引發事件其屬性的值將會和。When the commit fails, the will raise a event whose property will have a value of and . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何進行調查錯誤內容。The following code example demonstrates how to investigate the error context. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#50)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#50)]

summary.span: 取得表示錯誤的例外狀況。

span.span: Gets the exception that represents the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要處理此例外狀況由多個，藉由設定擲回的例外狀況，一次的處理常式結尾屬性`true`。To handle the exception by more than one , throw the exception again at the end of a handler by setting the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何檢查屬性。The following code example demonstrates checking the property. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#50)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#50)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ThrowException { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否要在完成 委派後擲出例外狀況。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to throw the exception after the delegate is finished with it.

value.span: 如果應該擲出例外狀況則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the exception should be thrown; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`false`如果所代表的例外狀況有處理屬性，而且不想要傳播至另一個例外狀況，可能會處理事件。Set this property to `false` if the has dealt with the exception represented by the property, and you do not want to propagate the exception to another that may handle the event. 偵錯，它可用來傳播例外狀況，並檢查錯誤的相關內容資訊的堆疊追蹤。For debugging purposes, it can be useful to propagate the exception and inspect the stack trace for information regarding the context of the error. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來表示，應該不會擲回例外狀況。The following code example demonstrates using the property to indicate that the exception should not be thrown. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#50)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#50)]
